description.zh-cn: 指2011年10月5日在泰国湄公河金三角水域发生的一起针对中国船员的恶性袭击事件，两艘商船上的13名中国船员全部遇害。
description.en: Refers to a vicious attack against Chinese sailors in the Golden Triangle region of the Mekong River in Thailand on October 5, 2011, in which all 13 Chinese crew members on two cargo ships were murdered.

description.zh-cn: 缅甸籍毒枭，糯康集团首领，湄公河惨案主犯。2012年被捕并移交中国审判，2013年被执行死刑。
description.en: A Burmese drug lord and leader of the Naw Kham gang, the mastermind of the Mekong River massacre. He was arrested in 2012, extradited to China for trial, and executed in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 由糯康领导，长期盘踞在湄公河金三角地区的贩毒武装组织，是湄公河惨案的直接策划和实施者。
description.en: A drug trafficking armed group led by Naw Kham, long established in the Golden Triangle region of the Mekong River. It was the direct planner and perpetrator of the Mekong River massacre.

description.zh-cn: 泰国的陆上武装部队。其第三军区第7步兵师的9名军人参与了湄公河惨案。
description.en: The land component of the Royal Thai Armed Forces. Nine soldiers from its 7th Infantry Division, 3rd Army Area, were involved in the Mekong River massacre.

description.zh-cn: 湄公河惨案受害船员的国籍国。事后主导了跨国调查、主犯抓捕和审判，并牵头建立了四国联合巡逻机制。
description.en: The home country of the victims of the Mekong River massacre. After the incident, it led the transnational investigation, capture, and trial of the main culprits, and initiated the establishment of a four-nation joint patrol mechanism.

description.zh-cn: 湄公河惨案主犯糯康的落网国。其警方成功抓获糯康并将其移交中国，并参与了后续的四国执法安全合作。
description.en: The country where Naw Kham, the mastermind of the Mekong River massacre, was captured. Its police successfully apprehended Naw Kham and extradited him to China, and participated in the subsequent four-nation law enforcement and security cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 湄公河惨案主犯糯康的国籍国。惨案实施者之一翁蔑在该国向政府投降后被移交中国，该国也参与了后续的四国执法安全合作。
description.en: The home country of Naw Kham, the mastermind of the Mekong River massacre. Weng Mie, one of the perpetrators, was handed over to China after surrendering to the government in Myanmar. The country also participated in the subsequent four-nation law enforcement and security cooperation.

nodes.id: 云南省昆明市中级人民法院

zh-cn: 云南省昆明市中级人民法院
en: Kunming Intermediate People's Court of Yunnan Province

description.zh-cn: 对湄公河惨案主犯进行一审并判处糯康等四人死刑的法院。
description.en: The court that conducted the first-instance trial for the main culprits of the Mekong River massacre and sentenced Naw Kham and three others to death.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华人民共和国国务院总理。案发后与泰国总理英拉通电话，要求泰方加紧审理此案，依法严惩凶手。
description.en: Then-Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. After the incident, he spoke with Thai Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra by phone, demanding that the Thai side expedite the trial and severely punish the perpetrators according to law.

description.zh-cn: 时任泰国总理。
description.en: Then-Prime Minister of Thailand.

nodes.id: 中老缅泰湄公河联合巡逻

zh-cn: 中老缅泰湄公河联合巡逻

description.zh-cn: 湄公河惨案发生后，由中国、老挝、缅甸、泰国四国执法部门建立的在湄公河流域联合执法的安全合作机制，旨在共同维护湄公河的航道及沿岸安全稳定。
description.en: A security cooperation mechanism for joint law enforcement in the Mekong River basin, established by the law enforcement departments of China, Laos, Myanmar, and Thailand after the Mekong River massacre, aimed at jointly maintaining the safety and stability of the waterway and its banks.

nodes.id: 平安航道联合扫毒行动

zh-cn: 平安航道联合扫毒行动

description.zh-cn: 湄公河惨案后，由中国、老挝、缅甸、泰国四国为有效整治湄公河流域突出的毒品犯罪问题而开展的联合行动。
description.en: A joint operation launched by China, Laos, Myanmar, and Thailand after the Mekong River massacre to effectively tackle the prominent drug crime problem in the Mekong River basin.

description.zh-cn: 糯康集团2号人物，湄公河惨案主犯之一。2013年于中国昆明被执行死刑。
description.en: The second-in-command of Naw Kham's gang and one of the main culprits in the Mekong River massacre. He was executed in Kunming, China in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 糯康集团3号人物，湄公河惨案主犯之一。2013年于中国昆明被执行死刑。
description.en: The third-in-command of Naw Kham's gang and one of the main culprits in the Mekong River massacre. He was executed in Kunming, China in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 糯康集团成员，湄公河惨案主犯之一。2013年于中国昆明被执行死刑。
description.en: A member of Naw Kham's gang and one of the main culprits in the Mekong River massacre. He was executed in Kunming, China in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 糯康集团4号人物，负责湄公河惨案的直接实施者。后向缅甸政府投降并被移交中国。
description.en: The fourth-in-command of Naw Kham's gang, responsible for the direct execution of the Mekong River massacre. He later surrendered to the Myanmar government and was handed over to China.

description.zh-cn: “玉兴8号”船长，湄公河惨案遇难者之一，杨植纬的父亲。
description.en: Captain of the 'Yuxing 8', one of the victims of the Mekong River massacre, and father of Yang Zhiwei.

description.zh-cn: “玉兴8号”水手，湄公河惨案遇难者之一，杨德毅的儿子。
description.en: Sailor on the 'Yuxing 8', one of the victims of the Mekong River massacre, and son of Yang Deyi.

description.zh-cn: “玉兴8号”船员，湄公河惨案遇难者之一，陈国英的丈夫。
description.en: Crew member of the 'Yuxing 8', one of the victims of the Mekong River massacre, and husband of Chen Guoying.

description.zh-cn: “玉兴8号”炊事员，湄公河惨案遇难者之一，何熙行的妻子。
description.en: Cook on the 'Yuxing 8', one of the victims of the Mekong River massacre, and wife of He Xixing.

description.zh-cn: 糯康是糯康集团的创始人和首领。
description.en: Naw Kham was the founder and leader of the Naw Kham's gang.

description.zh-cn: 桑康·乍萨是糯康集团的2号人物。
description.en: Sang Kham was the second-in-command of Naw Kham's gang.

description.zh-cn: 依莱是糯康集团的3号人物，负责与泰国不法军人联系。
description.en: Yi Lai was the third-in-command of Naw Kham's gang, responsible for liaising with corrupt Thai military personnel.

description.zh-cn: 翁蔑是糯康集团的4号人物，是案件的直接实施者。
description.en: Weng Mie was the fourth-in-command of Naw Kham's gang and the direct perpetrator of the massacre.

description.zh-cn: 糯康集团为报复中国船只并栽赃陷害，策划并实施了针对“华平号”和“玉兴8号”商船的劫持与屠杀。
description.en: To retaliate against Chinese vessels and frame them, the Naw Kham gang planned and executed the hijacking and massacre of the 'Huaping' and 'Yuxing 8' cargo ships.

description.zh-cn: 9名隶属于泰国皇家陆军第三军区第7步兵师的军人与糯康集团勾结，参与了对中国商船的扫射，并试图伪造清剿毒贩的现场。
description.en: Nine soldiers from the 7th Infantry Division of the Royal Thai Army's 3rd Army Area colluded with the Naw Kham gang, participated in shooting at the Chinese cargo ships, and attempted to fake a scene of a drug bust.

description.zh-cn: 因其认为缅甸军方征用中国商船偷袭其指挥部，糯康决定对中国船员实施报复，策划了湄公河惨案。
description.en: Believing that the Myanmar military had used a Chinese cargo ship to raid his headquarters, Naw Kham decided to retaliate against Chinese crew members, masterminding the Mekong River massacre.

description.zh-cn: 杨德毅在湄公河惨案中遇害。
description.en: Yang Deyi was killed in the Mekong River massacre.

description.zh-cn: 杨植纬在湄公河惨案中遇害。
description.en: Yang Zhiwei was killed in the Mekong River massacre.

description.zh-cn: 何熙行在湄公河惨案中遇害。
description.en: He Xixing was killed in the Mekong River massacre.

description.zh-cn: 陈国英在湄公河惨案中遇害。
description.en: Chen Guoying was killed in the Mekong River massacre.

description.zh-cn: 杨植纬是杨德毅的儿子。
description.en: Yang Zhiwei is the son of Yang Deyi.

description.zh-cn: 何熙行是陈国英的丈夫。
description.en: He Xixing is the husband of Chen Guoying.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国总理温家宝与时任泰国总理英拉通电话，要求泰方加紧审理湄公河惨案，依法严惩凶手。
description.en: Then-Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao spoke by phone with then-Thai Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra, demanding that the Thai side expedite the trial of the Mekong River massacre case and severely punish the perpetrators according to law.

relationships.target: 中老缅泰湄公河联合巡逻

description.zh-cn: 湄公河惨案的发生直接促成了中国、老挝、缅甸、泰国四国建立湄公河联合巡逻执法安全合作机制。
description.en: The Mekong River massacre directly led to the establishment of the Mekong River joint patrol and law enforcement security cooperation mechanism by China, Laos, Myanmar, and Thailand.

relationships.target: 平安航道联合扫毒行动

description.zh-cn: 为整治湄公河流域因惨案而凸显的毒品犯罪问题，中老缅泰四国在事后启动了“平安航道”联合扫毒行动。
description.en: To address the drug crime problem in the Mekong River basin highlighted by the massacre, the four nations of China, Laos, Myanmar, and Thailand subsequently launched the joint anti-drug operation 'Safe Channel'.

description.zh-cn: 老挝警方与中国专案组联手，在老挝波乔省成功抓获糯康。
description.en: Lao police, in cooperation with a Chinese special task force, successfully captured Naw Kham in Bokeo Province, Laos.

description.zh-cn: 老挝依法将湄公河惨案主犯糯康移交中国受审。
description.en: Laos extradited Naw Kham, the mastermind of the Mekong River massacre, to China for trial in accordance with the law.

description.zh-cn: 湄公河惨案直接实施者翁蔑在走投无路后向缅甸政府投降。
description.en: Weng Mie, the direct perpetrator of the Mekong River massacre, surrendered to the Myanmar government after being cornered.

description.zh-cn: 根据中缅双方协商结果，缅甸将被抓获的惨案实施者翁蔑移交给中国协助调查。
description.en: Based on the results of negotiations between China and Myanmar, Myanmar handed over the captured perpetrator Weng Mie to China to assist with the investigation.

relationships.source: 云南省昆明市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 昆明市中级人民法院一审宣判主犯糯康死刑，并于2013年3月1日执行。
description.en: The Kunming Intermediate People's Court sentenced the main culprit Naw Kham to death in the first-instance trial, and the execution was carried out on March 1, 2013.

relationships.source: 云南省昆明市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 昆明市中级人民法院一审宣判桑康·乍萨死刑，并于2013年3月1日执行。
description.en: The Kunming Intermediate People's Court sentenced Sang Kham to death in the first-instance trial, and the execution was carried out on March 1, 2013.

relationships.source: 云南省昆明市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 昆明市中级人民法院一审宣判依莱死刑，并于2013年3月1日执行。
description.en: The Kunming Intermediate People's Court sentenced Yi Lai to death in the first-instance trial, and the execution was carried out on March 1, 2013.

relationships.source: 云南省昆明市中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 昆明市中级人民法院一审宣判扎西卡死刑，并于2013年3月1日执行。
description.en: The Kunming Intermediate People's Court sentenced Zha Xika to death in the first-instance trial, and the execution was carried out on March 1, 2013.
